channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Cloud Pak for Applications
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Cloud Pak for Applications

item.title: CVE-2021-20364|2024-08-03T17:37:23.882Z -- ibm -- cloud%20pak%20for%20applications
item.description: IBM Cloud Pak for Applications 4.3 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 195035.

item.title: CVE-2021-20369|2024-08-03T17:37:23.965Z -- ibm -- cloud%20pak%20for%20applications
item.description: IBM Cloud Pak for Applications 4.3 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 195361.

item.title: CVE-2021-20424|2024-08-03T17:37:24.188Z -- ibm -- cloud%20pak%20for%20applications
item.description: IBM Cloud Pak for Applications 4.3 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. X-Force ID: 196309.

item.title: CVE-2021-20422|2024-08-03T17:37:24.492Z -- ibm -- cloud%20pak%20for%20applications
item.description: IBM Cloud Pak for Applications 4.3 could disclose sensitive information to a malicious attacker by accessing data stored in memory. IBM X-Force ID: 196304.

item.title: CVE-2021-20423|2024-08-03T17:37:24.306Z -- ibm -- cloud%20pak%20for%20applications
item.description: IBM Cloud Pak for Applications 4.3 could allow an authenticated user gain escalated privilesges due to improper application permissions. IBM X-Force ID: 196308.
